questions.question: How did the boys happen to come to the island?

choices.answer: They were on a Scout camping trip.
They were shipwrecked during a sailboat race.
They were ejected from a flaming airplane.
They had stolen a boat and were running away.

choices.answer: A conch shell
A British flag
A Bible
A whale jaw bone

choices.answer: A snake-thing which he calls a beastie

A pack of wild dogs

questions.question: How do the boys make fire?

choices.answer: One boy had a pack of matches which they use.
The fire was started by lightning.
One of the older boys found leaked fuel from the plane.

questions.question: How has Jack's personality developed during his stay on the island?

choices.answer: Jack is developing into a mystic and poet.

choices.answer: Roger is scared off by a noise in the jungle.

choices.answer: They become more interested in trying to build a canoe.

choices.answer: The paint protects his sensitive skin from the sun.
He thinks it will cheer up the others.
He uses the paint as a mask to blot out his real self.

choices.answer: They have eaten some poisoned meat.
None of them are really human.
It is all in their imaginations.
The dark side of the human personality can destroy mankind.

choices.answer: On the mountaintop
At the platform
At the shoreline
On the west side of the wreckage

questions.question: Who sees the dead parachutist first?

choices.answer: Ralph
Samneric
Jack
Piggy

questions.question: What does Ralph's demonstration of his hunting prowess lead to?

choices.answer: It re-establishes him as leader; the boys relight the fire.

Jack realizes Ralph's strength and vows to fight him.

questions.question: What question does Ralph ask Jack?

choices.answer: "Do you want to fight?"

"Do you think we'll ever get home?"
"Why do you hate me?"

The fruit they have collected

questions.question: What happens to the conch and Piggy?

choices.answer: Jack will drive Ralph off into the jungle.
Jack will hunt for and kill Ralph.
Jack will let Ralph join the hunters if he gives up leading.

questions.question: How is Ralph saved in the end?

choices.answer: The littluns push Jack off the mountaintop into the sea.
He is stronger than Jack and defeats him.
He swims to the safety of another island.
